price: ߊ߬ߟߋ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߢߌ߬ߣߌ߲߬ߞߊ߬ ߟߴߊ߬ ߕߊ߫ ߞߍߕߊ ߡߊ߬ ߘߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ ߟߋ߫ ߢߌ߬ߣߌ߲߬ߞߊ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: لَا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā yus'alu ʿammā yafʿalu wahum yus'alūna
